EmailTemplate.subject: TOMORROW - NCS Ambassador Training and NCS Action Day!!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for signing up to take part in the last NCS Ambassador training for 2016!
This is a really fantastic role where you work with our NCS Sales team to encourage as many young people as possible to sign up to NCS! This might be through speaking in assemblies, helping at parents evenings or generally being that go to person in you school!
When Saturday 5th of March at 13:45 to start at 14:00.
Where Waterloo Action Centre, 14 Baylis Road, London, SE1 7AA
Click here to see a picture of the building - if you do get lost or cant find it please call Kesiana on 07867616757
Dont forget that after the training session everyone is invited to the NCS Action Day celebration event where we will have preformances from Joshua KYOTE and Infecta!
If you would like your travel costs reimbursed please ensure you bring a receipt.
Any questions please do ask!
Rhiannon Downer
Graduate Associate Manager 07876836445
